C

Card - Class in CardPickup
The Card class simply represents a playing card - including its image and value.
Card() - Constructor for class CardPickup.Card
The default constructor creates an empty card with no value or image.
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class CardPickup.Card
A Card class can be created by specifying the rank and suit of the card as integers.
Card(String) - Constructor for class CardPickup.Card
A Card class can be created by specifying the string description of the Card.
CardPickup - package CardPickup
 
changeRank(int) - Method in class CardPickup.Card
changeRank() is used for A-Mod games where the rank can be increased or decreased by 1.
clearHand() - Method in class CardPickup.Hand
clearHand() clears out the hand of all cards
clearPossibleCards() - Method in class CardPickup.Node
Sets the set of possible cards to null
CLUBS - Static variable in class CardPickup.Card
 
compareTo(Object) - Method in class CardPickup.Card
compareTo() function implements the Comparable part of this class.
copyNode() - Method in class CardPickup.Node
A version of clone but named so your IDE doesn't complain about it not being a traditional clone method.
currentNode - Variable in class CardPickup.Player
